title: I'm gonna get banned for AFK one day and I can't do anything about it.

embed.description: So since the last patch every now and then (two times today..) the game just freezes while playing and doesn't let itself restart no matter what I do.

body:
Because every now and then, the game just freezes. When I close it with the task manager, restart and try to reconnect, it freezes in the loading screen, forcing me to restart my PC. The 'fun' thing is that when it freezes in the loading screen, my friends can't even remake the game.

Ever since Patch 6.14 this happens extremely infrequently and it's just annoying. Not because I will get punished eventually but mainly for ruining the game for others (especially for my friends).

As you can see I already asked for help quite some time ago and I didn't really get anything out of it. I repaired the client, reinstalled the game, all that stuff, but it keeps happening every now and then.

Can someone help me with my annoying problem?

replies.body: i have a simalar problem but i dont dc in games anymore sometimes the game becomes my wallpaper

It seems that your network is having trouble establishing a connection to the game server, so you may end up getting stuck at the loading screen or even stare at a blank screen.  I suggest going through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up for good.  Let me know the results!

That's only one part of the issue though.
Sometimes the game (already ingame) just freezes, I can still hear the sounds, but the game stands still.. Is there a common fix for that?
